components.name: Layout
components.description: Root layout component with metadata and global styles

components.name: Navbar
components.description: RTL-optimized navigation bar with the salon name and links to page sections

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Bold, attention-grabbing hero section showcasing the salon's premium services

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Showcase of salon's professional hair services with descriptions and pricing

components.name: GallerySection
components.description: Visual showcase of the salon's best work with a filterable image gallery

components.name: BookingSection
components.description: Interactive appointment booking system with service selection and calendar

components.name: TestimonialsSection
components.description: Customer reviews and testimonials showcasing positive experiences

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Frequently asked questions with expandable answers

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: Information about the salon's history, expertise and team

components.name: ContactSection
components.description: Contact form and information for customer inquiries

components.name: Footer
components.description: Page footer with copyright, links and additional information
